document_data.name: Dasharra Keldabar
document_data.mainbody: '''Dasharra Keldabar''' was a [[Shield dwarf]] who lived in [[Fireshear]] sometime after the [[War of the Silver Marches]].
document_data.Activities: She lived north of Fireshear on a ridge overlooking the sea, where she raised [[griffon]]s, trained them to be ridden, and taught others how to ride. To protect her precious mounts, she kept six [[Zhentarim]] mercenaries in her service. In addition to training those willing to ride griffons for a fee of 250 [[gp]], Dasharra allowed her mounts to be flown within a few hundred miles radius for a fee of 25 gp per person per day.
